span.b: If you are a parent or caregiver who needs child care in order to work in an essential job, please complete this survey.

span.span: In accordance with Governor Cuomo's executive order, schools will be closed until at least May 15th

span.strong:
District Buildings are closed to the public (including students and parents).
UPK and Kindergarten Registration is Postponed until May 1st, 2020

h3.a: Please see our help page for communication and FAQs about COVID-19 and the Fulton City School District.

span.strong: Vision: Our vision is to create a learning organization that is the centerpiece of the community, where all are welcomed and held to standards of excellence that foster hope and resilience for the future.

span.em: Mission: The Fulton School Community will empower students to develop the knowledge and skills to become respectful, responsible, productive citizens who are committed to lifelong learning.

br.span: Beliefs: All students can learn. Expectations drive outcomes. It is our responsibility to foster a culture of growth in our school and community. Community support is essential to the success of our students. Positive, safe, and supportive environments are vital.
